name: vue-mess-detector-nuxt-devtools
description: Vue Mess Detector for Nuxt Devtools

scripts.dev:prepare: nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare && nuxi prepare playground
scripts.release: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run prepack && changelogen --release && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: yarn lint && yarn test && yarn prepack && changelogen --release --patch && yarn publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: yarn lint && yarn test && yarn prepack && changelogen --release --minor && yarn publish && git push --follow-tags
